in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

From the ego's perspective, there are definitely downsides. Post-enlightenment of course there is no problem.

For example, enlightenment means you can't judge or moralize to anyone any more. Most egos will find this terribly disappointing People really love to hate.

item.title: The 5-MeO-DMT Mega-Thread

in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@john23 In the meantime, other psychedelics are still quite mindblowing. Particularly LSD. You can easily spend a few years just working with LSD, mining out a ton of profound insights and getting lots of growth.

Those of you looking for 5-MeO, that's great. But don't neglect other psychedelics.

It's like going to the zoo to see the lions. If you can't find the lions, the monkey exhibit is still damn cool

item.title: Can Someone Explain Islam To Me?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
On 7/30/2016 at 6:34 AM, electroBeam said:

How do you know that your interpretation is correct? Its all subjective isn't it?

Because I have had direct consciousness of God/Allah/Buddha/Absolute/Infinity/Shiva.

You can too. Then you will understand, in the same way that you have no doubt what a banana is, cause you've tasted one.

You can easily identify a true description of a banana, no matter which words are used. But only if you've seen and tasted a real banana first.

item.title: The 5-MeO-DMT Mega-Thread
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@herghly The extraction process will require some chemistry.

Snorting unextracted yopo will be lots of pain.

Yopo is mostly Bufotinin, not 5-MeO-DMT. Bufotinin is quite different from 5-MeO. People say it has a high body load, more visual, less consciousness expanding.

Extraction of yopo destroys all the 5-MeO.

item.title: Was the first Star Wars trilogy Lesser Jihad?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Luke did become a Jedi though, and so presumably to accomplish that, he had to conquer himself.

Within the Star Wars universe, to become a Jedi Knight is to complete the Greater Jihad.

Stars Wars did a good job of showing Luke face his inner self in the swamps with Yoda.

Luke couldn't just sit at home and meditate because he needed to find a guru first to show him the way.

item.title: No brain
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
4 minutes ago, metwinn said:

@Sweetest As Leo said in his video all this proves is that an appearance is is changing another appearance inside experience 

It doesn't even prove that much.

Technically all it proves is that two appearances are changing in sync with one another.

Cause & effect is a total illusion. Nothing causes anything else. There is an infinite tangle of co-arising phenomena. It's nonlinear, so the logical mind can never fully untangle it.

item.title: what does a completely green society look like?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
2 hours ago, sarapr said:

Here's  what i dont get, if an organization is orange and people turn into green after some time, would they eliminate the organization entirely or would they only change their way of doing things slightly? 

No, they would not eliminate the organization. Green is all about community and organizing. Green's organizations just have a flat hierarchy and are focused on human relationships rather than pleasing authority figures or meeting aribitrary sales quotas.

A hippie commune is a great example of a Green organization structure. Or if you're looking for corporate examples, think of companies like Google, who treat their employees pretty well, providing lots of on-campus benefits, and have people work in small open groups.

Lots of NGOs are Green. The UN is Green-ish.

Green wants human-centered, heart-centered communities.

item.title: what does a completely green society look like?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
11 hours ago, Outer said:

Scandinavian countries are extremely capitalistic too. Most rank higher than U.S. on economic freedom and have very low corruption. So it's kind of collective individualism.

Lol, that's Green! Green does not abolish capitalism. Green softens out cold, heartless capitalism with regulations and heart.

Stop conflating Green with radical Marxism. This is the problem with what Jordan Peterson teaches. It's a gross demonization and misrepresentation of Green which makes Orange and Blue people think that Green is evil, Soviet-style Communism. But it isn't. That was Blue/Red.

item.title: God
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

God doesn't judge anything. And no man has worth.

It's JP's ego-mind that judges and creates hierarchies of value 

God sees no hierarchies. God sees no value. God just is.

God loves all those things JP loves to hate

item.title: Psychedelics and autism
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

I remember PsychedSubstance YT channel had a video about an autistic guy doing a large dose of LSD.

It worked on him, but he needed to take like a triple dose.

Seems like autistic people will have a higher tolerance to psychedelics, but not so high you can't overpower it with high doses. Make sense to me, since spirituality happens in the right hemisphere and logic happens in the left.

The other thing that should help you is Kriya yoga

item.title: Consciousness/infinite intelligence
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
On 6/25/2018 at 5:37 PM, lmfao said:

There is unfathomable depth to conscious experience indeed, but the word "intelligence" isn't something which points towards experience for me. There can be interconnectedness between things, but I still don't resonate with the word "intelligence" because I see that word as a relatively useless abstraction about reality.

That's cause you assume you've become conscious of intellignece. But you haven't.

You haven't gone deep enough. When you do, you'll know why we call it intelligence, and not something else.

Same with "God". Those who haven't gone deep enough will not understand why that word is used. That's cause you haven't discovered God yet, so the word is meaningless to you.

It's deeper than you can possibly know. Keep digging and stay humble.

item.title: what does a completely green society look like?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
13 hours ago, sarapr said:

people would just sit around doing nothing cause there would be nothing else left to do?

A very typical Orange fear. Orange believes that it must always be competing, otherwise nothing will get done.

In reality, you can chill out and still accomplish work. You don't need a cutthroat attitude to be creative, productive, and happy. You don't need to work 60 hours a week.

Scandinavian countries are very Greenish. They also have the highest happiness index. Higher than the US.

When you have your basic survival needs satisfied, that's when life gets really interesting. Now you have time for art, education, philosophy, spirituality, self-actualization, exploration, community, bonding, deep relationships, raising their children to be good people, helping the world, etc.

item.title: Where on the Scale are Militant Vegans?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

Stop judging Green, and maybe then you'll have a shot at growing into it.

Green consciousness is quite evolved. Orange cannot fathom the shift that opens up Green. It's a pretty radical shift. You're not going to get to it through logic or debate or science. You must open your heart.

The difference between Orange and Green is that Green has opened his heart and Orange denies there is such a thing.

Don't think you can just skip over Green. It will take many of you Orange people 5 to 10 years of work before you start to see what Green is really about.

If you're thinking that Green is about becoming a militant vegan, you're totally missing the point.

item.title: Vaccines and dogma
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

The problem is, none of us really know the full costs or benefits of vaccines. People speculate without studying the issue or appreciating its complexity.

How many lives are saved by vaccines?

How many lives are damaged by vaccines?

You don't actually know.

item.title: Is Angela Merkel stage green?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

Many Northern European leaders are Green. Northern Europe skews very Green politically, socially, and economically.

One's level of consciousness or Spiral Dynamics level does not guarantee any kind of results.

Neither Green nor Yellow nor Turquoise guarantee that your policies will not hurt some people or lead to catastrophe.

Every stage is capable of bad policy. Policy is complex and can often backfire in unexpected ways.

Even so, Green policy tends to be much healthier overall than Orange or Blue policy.

What created the Syrian refugee crisis? Was it Green? Or was is George Bush's and the Neo-Con's Blue/Orange bright idea to invade Iraq? Which, BTW, resulted in over 100,000 civilian deaths.

"Destructive" is a relative thing. What feels "destructive" to you at Orange will not feel so once you're at Green. And vice versa.

There is no such thing as absolutely "destructive". Destructive is always a judgment relative to your ego and your Spiral stage.

item.title: Where on the Scale are Militant Vegans?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

What you have to understand about such Green people is that they are doing it out of an ideal of equality, in reaction against Blue & Orange.

They really care about the animals. So much so that it goes overboard.

Green cares too much, you could say. That is its strength and weakness.

The life of an animal is worth more than throwing blood on some customer -- in Green's eyes. You can't put a price on life.

They are more conscious than you in the sense that they see the equality of all life. An ego-filled person cannot see that an ant is worth as much as a human.

item.title: Is bitcoin Stage Orange?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

@jpcatrib I posted a video on my blog around Xmas 2017 about the amazing potential of Bitcoin for democratizing society in the future. In that sense, Bitcoin could become a Green technology.

But there is also a lot of currency manipulation and gambling that goes on with BItcoin. People mining for Bitcoin hoping become overnight millionaires. That is a very Orange phenomena.

Bitcoin is similar to the internet as a whole: it has a huge democratizing influence, but with this democratization comes all kind of vulgarity, manipulation, and nonsense.

On the one hand the internet gave us Wikipedia, on the other hand it gave us porn and 4chan. Technology almost always tends to be a mixed bag, requiring nuanced sorting of wheat from chaff and wise application.

In the hands of a fool, any tool become dangerous. And every stage of the Spiral will try to use new technology to entrench and defend itself.

Stage Blue terrorists will not hesitate to use stage Orange nuclear weapons if they can get their hands on them.

item.title: Spiral Dynamics Stage Orange Examples Mega-Thread
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

@Self-Mastery "I don't remember people ever being in denial of what science is..." -- Niel DeGrasse Tyson

I find this statement rather absurd for a scientist to say.

Mankind has ALWAYS been in denial about science/reality, including scientists themselves!

Scientists themselves deny all new radical scientific discoveries.

Perfect example of Orange's lack of epistemic nuance.

item.title: Why would actualized.org followers be mostly orange?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@robdl Zen masters accumulate lots of experience. And not just on the cushion. They read and study scriptures too. And they learn from teaching.

You're not just going to awaken in one fell swoop out of the blue and have life mastered.

The process is both gradual and sudden.

Spiritual schools exist precisely because there is much to learn.

item.description:
in Self-Actualization
11 minutes ago, Timothy said:

It's hard for me to imagine sex being had under the purpose of compassion, true love, beauty, vulnerability, and openness. Typically most girls I know arent turned on by these things.

Oh man, you couldn't be more mistaken.

Women LOOOOOOOVE Green sex!

You will love it too.

To you it seems as though they aren't turned on by it because they follow your lead. So if all you lead them towards is shallow Orange sex, that's all they accept without even knowing what they're missing. And you cannot lead a woman to Green sex unless you are first comfortable being there yourself. When you give a woman Green sex, she will love you forever.

Most guys suck at sex. Sex is an artform.

Like attracts like.

Orange attracts Orange.

Green attracts Green.

item.title: Why would actualized.org followers be mostly orange?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
26 minutes ago, Jed Vassallo said:

@Leo Gura Not saying I'm anywhere near yellow, but the arguing and large egos wanting to comment on everything does make the forum difficult. I personally rarely comment, cause I usually just get ego responses. It can be frustrating. If it was a truly a forum for enlightened people, or people on a dedicated path to enlightenment, and not just everyone with their opinions about everything, then I'm sure more 'yellow' people would comment. 

That's the nature of the beast.

Even enlightened people argue with each other and criticize each other. It's a very sneaky problem that few people fully appreciate.

With diversity comes conflict and a certain degrees of chaos.

Infinity is always at war with itself as it radiates infinite diversity.

Even Zen monasteries go to war with each other.

The wise person sees the meta-dynamic and is able to rise above the warring horde (within certain limits).

Enlightened people do not need forums. This forum is for people who are struggling. This is kindergarten

in Self-Actualization

@Leo Gura do you think ‘dr Phil’ show is orange or green?

I haven't really watched it, but Dr Phil feels Green to me.

Of course all mainstream self-help shows are heavily monetized with an Orange biz model and place a strong emphasis on Orange achievement advice because that's what sells and what people crave.

So even if Dr Phil himself is Green, the corporate execs running his show probably push him to go Orange a lot.

item.title: Stephen Hicks Explaining Postmodernism- the development of stages blue/orange/green
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

Looks like a good primer.

Watch my Derrida episode after you're done with this.

I get the sense that most people still haven't understood the significance of what was said in the Derrida episode.

And I have a really great book about Derrida in my book list. Highly recommend it if you want to understand post-modernism properly. And it's any easy and fun read! (Which is very rare for Derrida books.)

item.title: Coming off social media for Green?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

It's not that you cannot be Green without ditching social media. But if you're on social media, it will keep you from connecting with Being and nature and people.

The very fact that you are afraid to leave social media because it is integral to your business/career is a huge sign that Orange has you by the balls. You are prioritizing success over other things and you're addicted to it.

No one is saying you should never use social media. We're giving you suggestions for how to evolve to higher levels of consciousness. In the same way that you might tell a fat person to stop sitting on the couch. This does not mean you need to throw your couch into the dumpster and sit on a bed of nails.

item.title: Stage Orange and Science. Thoughts?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

Disowning reality does not work.

The purpose of Spiral Dynamics is to help you OWN every stage. That can only happen when you understand that every stage is necessary to the functioning of the whole.

Yes, even Nazi's are necessary. OWN it.

Everything is you.

Of course many Green people watch me too.

Fully overcoming Orange isn't easy cause it's the predominant culture of our time. Even much of personal dev is Orange.

As my channel evolved over the last year or two, I've probably alienated many solid Orange people with my mystical talk. So maybe now I have more Green people. Who can say? The majority of viewers stay silent. The wisest, most Yellow viewers probably don't ever post a comment, which skews my understanding of my audience.

item.title: I hate stage green so much!!!
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
30 minutes ago, Clayman said:

I find it really puzzling, where do people see greenness in political correctness. Wonder what Trotsky would say about it.

Every color on the Spiral has its own version of political correctness:

Blue PC = banning vulgarity, sex, porn, blasphemy, banning criticism of the church/civilization

Orange PC = banning criticism of the evils of corporations

Green PC = banning racist speech, hate speech, cruel speech, banning criticism of Green

If you criticize Islam in Blue Saudi Arabia, they will kill you.

If you expose the evils of factory farming in Orange America, they will sue you.

If you call someone a racial slur in a Green organization, they will fire you.

@martins name Being a good and intimate lover is actually Green

An Orange guy doesn't care about pleasing his woman in bed. He pumps and dumps.

item.title: I hate stage green so much!!!
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
10 minutes ago, Onecirrus said:

@Leo Gura I am twenty years old.

I don't believe I have autism but green seems too emotional and pacifistic. I see emotions as a weakness and they have often caused me to sabotaged my own life. I also think to accept  and tolerate the views of others makes green seem like a doormat and to Submit to a group or community is to be a sheep. Its also unsettling to learn that sjw snowflakes are actually more developed than me. 

I have no idea about my testosterone levels, I don't believe I resent women more than anyone else, but you right on the money when it comes to socialization. Maybe orange just needs some friends.

Right, that's pretty much what I suspected.

So what that tells me is, you're a typical young male in stage Orange who is still evolving and will eventually mature into Green.

Nothing abnormal here. You have been very thoroughly conditioned by our heavily Orange culture.

"Emotions as a weakness" is a very common idea these days with young men. It's part of Orange culture and trying to find your male identity. But as you mature as a male, you will soften and you will see the power of emotions.

In your 20's, you still haven't found yourself as a persona. (Never mind enlightenment.) So one of the ways young males go about finding themselves is striving to fit the "alpha" ideal. Which requires a denial of emotions, femininity, softness, vulnerability, crying, caring, empathy, community, cooperation, love, relationship, etc.

item.title: Recent Uptick In Trolling
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

We've been having an uptick in trolling and personal sniping on this forum recently, and I'm getting sick of reading it.

This is a warning to all trolls: stop, or you will be banned.

  • Stop sniping at other members
  • Stop creating purposefully inflammatory topics
  • Stop defending and justifying yourself
  • Stop acting like a jerk
  • Stop acting like a cocky know-it-all
  • Stop purposefully contradicting other members just to provoke them
  • Stop speculating about things
  • Stop blaming others for trolling or provoking you
  • Stop telling other members what color on the Spiral they are (let them figure it out for themselves)
  • Stop telling other members how wrong they are
  • Stop telling other members how unconscious they are

Your actions are souring this forum.

Be an example of higher consciousness on this forum. If someone provokes you, do not attack back or take their bait or justify yourself, Just let it go. If the trolls persist we will ban them, so there's no need to justify yourself in response to trolls. Take the higher ground.

Make your points without making it personal

Be nice

item.title: I hate stage green so much!!!
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

@Onecirrus I'm curious, how old are you?

I suspect there are a lot of people (mostly autistic-type young males) in the world who feel like you, which is why speakers like JP, Sam Harris, Dave Rubin, Stephen Molyneux, Trump, etc. have cult followings.

It would be interesting to learn more about how their followers really feel inside and why they get triggered by Green so much. Is it just a symptom of passing from Blue to Orange? Or is it something deeper like overabundance of testosterone, resentment towards women due to inability to get laid, lack of socialization due to an overly-digital lifestyle, autistic spectrum, etc?

item.title: Have We Been Getting Too Caught Up In Color Signatures?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
9 hours ago, Baldmunt said:

Another thing i've thought about is that people somehow values stage 'green, yellow and turquoise' as 'better than lower' psychees. Isn't that also something that comes along with the thinking of 'orange' in becoming better than other persons in some kind of way?

That tendency is very hard to overcome. The ego judges "high consciousness" as "better than" low consciousness. This is of course false. A truly conscious person knows that consciousness is not better than unconsciousness. All is one. There is no better or worse. Those are all relative judgments of the ego, which are very difficult to surrender in total.

item.title: Have We Been Getting Too Caught Up In Color Signatures?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

It's just a consequence of releasing these Spiral videos. After the series is over, it will pass and we will move on to other stuff.

It's not possible to teach Spiral Dynamics to this audience without all this hoopla.

At the end of the series, I'm gonna tell you:

"Now, drop all of Spiral Dynamics. It isn't true."

item.title: Spiral Dynamics Stage Orange Examples Mega-Thread
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

Guys, when you're posting videos, try to find short snippets which demonstrate the point in a minutes or two.

Hour long videos aren't good for this list.

We want to find examples which distill Orange down to its essence.
